attack_msg: [Your] teeth, sharp as dagger, seek to tear out a chunk of [their] midsection.
[You] lunge forth, bearing down on [them] with [your] vile teeth and disgusting breath.
[You're] cautious at first... snapping at [them] from a distance, searching for a taste...
[You] lick[y] [your] lips before bearing down on [them].
[You] strike[y] quickly, hoping to capture an easy morsel off guard.
[You] leap[y] into the air, trying to sink [your] teeth into [their] neck.
